hadiths.text: It was a narrated from Ayyub, from Nafi from Ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: "The two parties to a transaction both have the choice who long as they have not separated or one of them says to the other: 'Decide!"' (Sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى نَافِعٍ فِي لَفْظِ حَدِيثِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differneces Reported From Nafi
